title: VSEPR - decrease in bond angle CH4 NH3 H2O due to

content.prompt: According to the VSEPR model, the progressive decrease in the bond angles in the series of molecules CH4, NH3, and H2O is best accounted for by the

choices.label: increasing number of unshared pairs of electrons
